sentences: Marcelly Morena (born c.1986) is a Brazilian singer and samba dancer who in 2016 became the first transgender woman to dance as a passista in Rio de Janeiro's Carnival.

Marcelly Morena (born c.1986) is a Brazilian singer and samba dancer who in 2016 became the first transgender woman to dance as a passista in Rio de Janeiro's Carnival. Passistas lead a marching band for the entire length of the Carnival parade.
Morena was born in and grew up in Duque de Caxias, a suburb city of Rio de Janeiro, and danced from a young age.
